timeline.bodyText: Why do these data format variables have the Dummy infix in their name? I do not see anything "dummy" in how they are used.
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: The idea is that it's the dataformat serializing dummy object. That said, I would not veto a renaming of DummyObject too.
replies.author: aldettinger

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. Thanks for the explanation :)
replies.author: ppalaga
